["In the 2005 movie 'The Fog', how did Blair prepare for her underwater scenes?"]
Options:
A. ["She spent 12 hours in a water tank for two days, taking only short breaks."]
B. ["She hired a stunt double to perform the underwater scenes."]
C. ["She used CGI to create the underwater scenes."]
D. ["She filmed the underwater scenes in an actual ocean."]
Correct Answer: ["She spent 12 hours in a water tank for two days, taking only short breaks."]
